creator: paulmcmahan@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 20271
new patch for signature problems with javax.servlet.jsp

adding new patch that includes a fix for a jsp API signature problem with
javax/servlet/jsp/el/ScopedAttributeELResolver

This second patch is cumulative, obsoleting the previous patch.  This should be
the last patch for JSP 2.1 signature problems.	I plan to open a separate
bugzilla to attach a patch for some signature problems with EL.
creator: paulmcmahan@gmail.com
